1.2.2.en:
Fix potential crash cases reported by Sentry
Optimize adapter stop behaviour
1.2.2.de:
Behebt mögliche Crashfälle, die von Sentry gemeldet wurden
Optimieren des Adapters
1.2.2.ru:
Исправление потенциальных аварийных случаев, сообщенных Sentry
Оптимизируйте поведение остановки адаптера
1.2.2.pt:
Corrigir casos potenciais de acidente relatados pela Sentry
Otimizar o comportamento da parada do adaptador
1.2.2.fr:
Correction des cas de crash potentiels signalés par Sentry
Optimiser le comportement d'arrêt de l'adaptateur
1.2.2.it:
Fissare potenziali casi di crash segnalati da Sentry
Ottimizzare il comportamento di arresto dell'adattatore
1.2.2.es:
Fijar posibles casos de accidentes reportados por Sentry
Optimize adapter stop behaviour
1.2.2.pl:
Fixowe przypadki katastrofy (ang.)
Optimize adaptator stop behaviour
1.2.2.zh-cn:
Sentry报告的潜在事故
减少适应者停止行为

1.2.1.it: Impedisci gli avvisi del controller js
1.2.1.es: Prevenir las advertencias del controlador js

1.2.0.en:
Fix tracklist request issues
Fix several potential crash cases and object warnings
Add Sentry for crash reporting
1.2.0.de:
Beheben Sie Probleme mit Tracklist-Anforderungen
Beheben Sie mehrere potenzielle Absturzfälle und Objektwarnungen
Fügen Sie Sentry für Absturzberichte hinzu
1.2.0.ru:
Исправить проблемы с запросом треклиста
Исправлено несколько возможных случаев сбоя и предупреждений об объектах.
Добавьте Sentry для отчетов о сбоях
1.2.0.pt:
Corrigir problemas de solicitação de lista de faixas
Corrigir vários casos de falha em potencial e avisos de objetos
Adicionar Sentinela para relatórios de falhas
1.2.0.nl:
Problemen met tracklijstverzoeken oplossen
Verschillende mogelijke crashgevallen en objectwaarschuwingen oplossen
Sentry toevoegen voor crashrapportage
1.2.0.fr:
Résoudre les problèmes de demande de liste de pistes
Correction de plusieurs cas de plantage potentiels et avertissements d'objet
Ajouter Sentry pour les rapports de plantage
1.2.0.it:
Risolti i problemi di richiesta della tracklist
Risolvi diversi potenziali casi di arresto anomalo e avvisi sugli oggetti
Aggiungi Sentinella per la segnalazione degli arresti anomali
1.2.0.es:
Solucionar problemas de solicitud de lista de canciones
Solucione varios posibles casos de bloqueo y advertencias de objetos
Agregar Sentry para informes de fallas
1.2.0.pl:
Napraw problemy z żądaniami listy utworów
Napraw kilka potencjalnych przypadków awarii i ostrzeżeń o obiektach
Dodaj Sentry do zgłaszania awarii
1.2.0.zh-cn:
修复曲目列表请求问题
修复几个潜在的崩溃案例和对象警告
添加 Sentry 以进行崩溃报告

1.1.8.en:
Fixed the shuffle behaviour 
Allowed to set the default shuffle value
The type of trackNo corrected
1.1.8.de:
Das Shuffle-Verhalten wurde behoben
Erlaubt, den Standard-Shuffle-Wert festzulegen
Die Art des TracksNein korrigiert
1.1.8.ru:
Исправлено поведение в случайном порядке
Разрешено установить значение перемешивания по умолчанию
Тип трека: Нет исправлено
1.1.8.pt:
Corrigido o comportamento aleatório
Tem permissão para definir o valor aleatório padrão
O tipo de faixa Não corrigido
1.1.8.nl:
Het shuffle-gedrag opgelost
Toegestaan om de standaard shuffle-waarde in te stellen
Het type trackGeen gecorrigeerd
1.1.8.fr:
Correction du comportement de lecture aléatoire
Autorisé à définir la valeur de lecture aléatoire par défaut
Le type de pisteNon corrigé
1.1.8.it:
Risolto il problema di shuffle
Autorizzato a impostare il valore di riproduzione casuale predefinito
Il tipo di tracciaNo corretto
1.1.8.es:
Se corrigió el comportamiento de reproducción aleatoria.
Se permite establecer el valor aleatorio predeterminado
El tipo de pista No corregido
1.1.8.pl:
Naprawiono zachowanie odtwarzania losowego
Umożliwiono ustawienie domyślnej wartości odtwarzania losowego
Rodzaj toruNie poprawiono
1.1.8.zh-cn:
修复了随机播放行为
允许设置默认的shuffle值
轨道类型未更正

common.name: Commands to control playback related to the playlist
Commands to control playback related to the show
Commands to control playback related to the album
Commands to control playback related to the favorite collection
Commands to control playback related to the current active device
Available collection saved in common part. Change this value to a collectionId to start this collection.
contains list of collection ids as string, pattern: collectionId;collectionId;collectionId;...
contains list of collections as string, patter: name;name;name;...
Available show saved in common part. Change this value to a showId to start this show.
contains list of playlist ids as string, pattern: showId;showId;showId;...
contains list of shows as string, patter: name;name;name;...
Available album saved in common part. Change this value to a albumId to start this album.
contains list of albums ids as string, pattern: albumId;albumId;albumId;...
contains list of albums as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of artists as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of artist | album as string, patter: name;name;name;...
Available playlist saved in common part. Change this value to a userId-playlistId to start this playlist.
contains list of playlist ids as string, pattern: userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;...
contains list of playlists as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of your playlist ids as string, pattern: userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;userId-playlistId;...
contains list of your playlists as string, patter: name;name;name;...
All devices saved in common part. Change this value to a device id to start playing on this.
contains list of all device ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
contains list of all devices as string, patter: name;name;name;...
contains list of available device ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
contains list of available devices as string, patter: name;name;name;...

Start a new context based on spotify uri. Set a javascript object like: {"device_id":"2fb7dce39e76b94f4a1dc52d896048cac8276952","context_uri":"spotify:user:11128263953:playlist:3sP5z9L9w0GHRWQlnZgyQN","offset":{"position":5}} or: {"uris":["spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh","spotify:track:1301WleyT98MSxVHPZCA6M"],"position_ms":24050} For more infos look at: https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/player/start-a-users-playback/
set track id to play this track; switch the context to track
set track no of playlist to play this track
set episode no of show to play this episode
set trackNo no of album to play this track
set trackNo no of collection to play this track
set playlist id to play; in combination with player.playlist.owner, if it is empty the authorized user will be used; first set player.playlist.owner, then player.playlist.id
set playlist owner to start playlist in combination with player.playlist.id; first set player.playlist.owner, then player.playlist.id
paste here the redirect url of the authorization url
count of found snapshot_ids for playlistpolling
count of not found snapshot_ids for last playlistpolling
get playlists owned by authorized user
get currently playing playlist owned by authorized user
check current track for Favorite-Collection owned by authorized user
get shows owned by authorized user
get albums owned by authorized user
get favorite collection of tracks owned by authorized user
artist name; comma separated if multiple artists
artist image url of the first available artist if multiple artists
image url of the current context; album, artist or playlist
Episodes of the show saved in common part. Change this value to a episode position number to start this show with this episode.
contains list of episodes as string, patter: 0;1;2;...
contains list of episodes as string, patter: episode;episode;episode;...
contains list of episodes as string with position, pattern: 0:episode;1:episode;2:episode;...
contains list of episode ids as string with position, pattern: 0:id;1:id;2:id;...
contains list of episode ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
contains list of episodes as array object, pattern: [{id: "id", Name: "Name", ...}, ...]
Tracks of the album saved in common part. Change this value to a track position number to start this album with this track.
contains list of tracks as string, patter: 0;1;2;...
contains list of tracks as string, patter: track;track;track;...
contains list of tracks as string with position, pattern: 0:track;1:track;2:track;...
contains list of track ids as string with position, pattern: 0:id;1:id;2:id;...
contains list of track ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...

contains list of tracks as array object, pattern: [{id: "id", Name: "Name", {id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, ...], name: "albumName"}, durationMs: 253844, duration: 4:13, discNumber: 1, explicit: false}, ...]

contains list of tracks as array object, pattern: [{id: "id", Name: "Name", {id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, ...], name: "albumName"}, durationMs: 253844, duration: 4:13, discNumber: 1, explicit: false}, ...]
Tracks of the collection saved in common part. Change this value to a track position number to start this collection with this track.
contains list of tracks as string, patter: 0;1;2;...
contains list of tracks as string, patter: track;track;track;...
contains list of tracks as string with position, pattern: 0:track;1:track;2:track;...
contains list of track ids as string with position, pattern: 0:id;1:id;2:id;...
contains list of track ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...
Tracks of the playlist saved in common part. Change this value to a track position number to start this playlist with this track.
contains list of tracks as string, patter: 0;1;2;...
contains list of tracks as string, patter: title - artist;title - artist;title - artist;...
contains list of tracks as string with position, pattern: 0:title - artist;1:title - artist;2:title - artist;...
contains list of track ids as string with position, pattern: 0:id;1:id;2:id;...
contains list of track ids as string, pattern: id;id;id;...

contains list of tracks as array object, pattern: [{id: "id", title: "title", artistName: "artistName1, artistName2", artistArray: [{id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, {id: "artistId", name: "artistName"}, ...], album: {id: "albumId", name: "albumName"}, durationMs: 253844, duration: 4:13, addedAt: 15395478261235, addedBy: "userId", discNumber: 1, episode: false, explicit: false, popularity: 56}, ...]
it is not possible to control restricted devices with the adapter
